meanings.definition: Lacking intelligence or common sense; foolish or scatterbrained.
meanings.sent1: The birdbrained decision to wear shorts in the snow was not very smart.
meanings.sent2: She always forgets her keys; she can be so birdbrained sometimes.
meanings.sent3: His birdbrained idea to use a rake as a microphone made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The birdbrained plan to stop a leak with a band-aid was doomed to fail.
meanings.sent5: Being birdbrained in a test is like trying to swim with shoes on.

meanings.definition: Characterized by frivolity or lack of seriousness; flighty or capricious.
meanings.sent1: The birdbrained squirrel kept changing its mind about which nut to eat.
meanings.sent2: Her birdbrained behavior at the party annoyed some of the guests.
meanings.sent3: The birdbrained decision to wear a tiara to the grocery store raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His birdbrained idea to juggle watermelons ended in a messy disaster.
meanings.sent5: The birdbrained butterfly flitted from flower to flower without a care in the world.
